Oil 2-Inches Thick Found On Gulf Sea Floor – CBS News

Sep 14, 2010 · Far beneath the surface of the Gulf of Mexico, deeper than divers can go, scientists say they are finding oil from the busted BP well on the sea’s muddy and mysterious bottom. Oil at least two inches thick was found Sunday night and Monday morning about a mile beneath the surface
